text: midneun jadeul-iyeo! bulsinhan jadeulcheoleom doeji malla. geudeul-eun geudeul-ui hyeongjedeul-i daejileul tteonageona chuljeonbyeong-il ttaemyeon geudeul-e gwanhae malhagil “man-yag geudeul-i uliwa hamkke iss-eossdalamyeon geudeul-eun jugjido salhaedoejido anh-ass-eul geos-ila.” hananimkkeseoneun geuleohge geugeos(geudeul-ui saeng-gaggwa mal)eul geudeul ma-eum sog-ui aetongham-eulo dusinola. hananimkkeseo salge hasigo jugge hasim-ila. hananimkkeseoneun geudaedeul-i haenghaneun geos-eul bogo gyesineun bun-ila
